servinfo.title: A droning noise is heard from inside of the vehicle, but not particularly noticeable in engine compartment

condition.ptxt: A droning noise is heard from inside of the vehicle, but not particularly noticeable in engine compartment

action.ptxt: Reposition clamps or increase the number of clamps.

ps.ptxt: Resonance caused by pulsation from variations in refrigerant pressure

action.ptxt: Attach a silencer to tubing, or modify its position and length.
